title: Advanced Post Template - All Features Showcase
shortDescription: A comprehensive example showcasing all available post formatting options including two-column layouts, callouts, code blocks, and more.

blocks.text: Welcome to this comprehensive guide! This post demonstrates all available content block types you can use to create rich, engaging content.
Basic Text Formatting
This is a standard paragraph. You can use paragraphs to write regular text content. They provide clean, readable text with proper spacing.
Quotes and Citations
Blockquotes are perfect for highlighting important statements, citations, or memorable quotes. They stand out with a distinctive left border.
Lists and Organization
Use lists to organize information clearly:

items: Unordered lists are great for non-sequential items
They help break down information into digestible chunks
Each item gets a bullet point automatically
Perfect for features, benefits, or key points
Ordered lists work well for step-by-step instructions
Numbers help readers follow a sequence

blocks.text: Callout Boxes
Callout boxes help highlight important information. Here are all available types:

blocks.title: Information
blocks.text: Use info callouts for helpful tips, additional context, or general information that complements your main content.

blocks.title: Success
blocks.text: Success callouts are perfect for highlighting positive outcomes, achievements, or best practices.

blocks.title: Warning
blocks.text: Warning callouts draw attention to potential issues, important caveats, or things to watch out for.

blocks.title: Error
blocks.text: Error callouts are ideal for critical warnings, common mistakes to avoid, or serious issues that need attention.
Two-Column Layouts
Create side-by-side comparisons or present related information in parallel:

blocks.left: Left Column Content: Perfect for comparisons, pros vs cons, or presenting two related concepts side by side. This helps readers compare information easily.
blocks.right: Right Column Content: The two-column layout automatically stacks on mobile devices for better readability. Use this for before/after, old/new, or any parallel information.

blocks.title: Prerequisites
blocks.text: Make sure you have Node.js 18+ and npm installed before starting.

# Clone and setup
git clone https://github.com/username/project.git
cd project
npm install
npm run dev
